name: Alina Ene
content: Alina Ene Alina Ene Teaching Research Home Associate Professor Department of Computer Science Boston University Email: aene [at] bu [dot] edu I am an Associate Professor in the Computer Science department at Boston University. My main research interests are machine learning algorithms, discrete and continuous optimization, approximation algorithms, and differentially private algorithms. Before joining BU, I was an Assistant Professor in the department of Computer Science at the University of Warwick and a postdoc at Princeton University. I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science from UIUC, where I was very fortunate to be advised by Chandra Chekuri. Prior to that, I was a Computer Science major at Princeton University. Current Teaching: CS 599 E1: Algorithms for Machine Learning
